attributes.action: Pass a Green New Deal in the UK and help prevent Climate Change.
attributes.additional_details:
The Earth is dying, Oceans are rising, our gorgeous rainforests are being chopped up for profit. Is this really what you want? For the oceans to reclaim land? For another mass extinction to cause havoc on our beautiful planet and the animals and plants that live here?
For large parts of the earth to become uninhabitable within the next century because of selfish corporations wanting to line their wallets?

We need to take immediate action or face the apocalyptic consequences that come with it.
attributes.background:
We only have 12 years until the effects of climate change are irreversible. So what are the government going to do about it?

I’m making this petition to raise awareness of the necessity of a Green New Deal being passed and to do our duty as residents of the Earth.
